content.text: Ready Services provides immediate access to pre-configured jewelry products and services. This includes inventory management, pricing updates, and instant order processing capabilities.
Services are available 24/7 with guaranteed uptime of 99.5%. Maintenance windows will be scheduled during off-peak hours with prior notification.
Monthly subscription fee of â‚¹2,999 plus transaction fees of 2.5% per order. Payment due within 15 days of invoice generation.
Service provider is not liable for any indirect damages or loss of business due to service interruptions. Maximum liability is limited to one month's subscription fee.
Either party may terminate this agreement with 30 days written notice. All pending orders must be completed before termination becomes effective.
All user data is encrypted and stored securely. We comply with applicable data protection laws and do not share personal information with third parties without consent.
24/7 customer support available via phone, email, and live chat. Response time guaranteed within 2 hours for critical issues.
